incidents.title: Staging operations regularly timing out
incidents.description: We're aware of staging operations regularly timing out on oss.sonatype.org
incidents.content:
We're aware of staging operations regularly timing out on oss.sonatype.org

2021-01-23T17:19:53.000Z
Investigating

We will be pausing staging operations off an on as part of our investigation process. Builds are already failing with timeouts, but, while staging operations are paused you'll see 405 errors if you try to start a new build.

2021-01-23T17:22:12.000Z
Resolved

Load has subsided on its own, and staging operations appear to be running normally again.

incidents.title: Files Conversion Issues
incidents.description: Our origin servers were responding slowly.
incidents.content:
Our origin servers were responding slowly.

2021-01-23T13:01:01.000Z
Monitoring

Our Files Conversion System is not responding properly and we've investigating what is causing this issue.

2021-01-23T13:01:53.000Z
Restarting

We restart our Files Conversion Service, it will be recovered in minutes.

2021-01-23T13:13:02.000Z
Investigating

Staging operations have piled overnight. We will be pausing staging operations to allow those in flight to clear. This will cause new builds to fail with a 405 error. After that, we'll also be restarting oss.sonatype.org, so you can expect 5xx errors at that time.

2021-01-23T13:22:32.000Z
Update

We will be restarting oss.sonatype.org one more time for one more config change. This will be the last service interruption for tonight.

2021-01-23T17:07:51.000Z
Monitoring

Restart is complete, and we'll be monitoring the impact of our latest changes to staging performance.

2021-01-23T17:08:27.000Z
Resolved

This incident has been resolved.
